messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Wait, wait! Hold on a second. I just had a change of heart. You know what? I think I actually want to keep the silver one and send back the gold 128GB one instead. More storage is nice, but I think the silver looks better on my desk! 

And actually, instead of the credit card, could you just put the refund for that gold one onto my gift card? That would be way easier for me. Sorry for being so indecisive!
